article_title: Long lines fail to deter some early shoppers
article_text:
Many stores didn’t wait for Black Friday to hold sales

For some, Thanksgiving has gone from a tradition of eating to a tradition of shopping

Some people got in line hours before stores opened

article_metadata.news-keywords: black friday, thanksgiving day sales, thanksgiving day shoppingl
article_metadata.description: Adriel Fernandez and his girlfriend, Estephanie Arrieta, were among the first group of 30 customers to walk into a BrandsMart on Thursday afternoon after waiting for four hours. The line went around the corner, while hundreds of people waited patiently for their turn to be at the front.
article_metadata.title: Long lines fail to deter some early shoppers | Miami Herald
